text: Al Richardson may refer to: * Al Richardson (historian) (1941–2003), British Trotskyist historian and activist * Al Richardson (end) (1935–1977), American football player for the Boston Patriots * Al Richardson (American football) (born 1957), American football linebacker ==See also== *Alan Richardson (disambiguation) *Albert Richardson (disambiguation) *Alexander Richardson (disambiguation) *Alvin Richardson, see 91st New York State Legislature *Richardson (surname)
title: Al Richardson
